players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana is dead. This is very shocking. We need to figure out what happened. I'm a villager, and I don't have any special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Bob: "I'm shocked by Diana's death. I'm a villager too, and we need to work together to find the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We should vote to eliminate him today."
You: "Charlie claims Bob is the mafioso. Bob, what do you say to this accusation?"
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation results. Bob is the mafioso, and we must vote him out to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
